javelin.model.world

Class Caravan

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.world.WorldActor
      • javelin.model.world.Caravan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Caravan
extends WorldActor
    A figure that travels from one city to a human (neutral) city. It can be visited to buy Items. If it reaches a human Town it grows by 1 Town.size - this is an incentive for the player to protect merchants. Unlike Town Items, these are not crafted but sold as-is, and as such are removed after purchase.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
